reviewText: Love this show all the time

I am a 63 year old grandmother who watches the Power Ranger movies with her grandchildren. Why? Because I want to know how the shows they watch influence them. While the acting may not win Oscars, the costumes, visual effects, and stunts are amazing. My grandchildren learn to do what is right, to continue pursuing their goals against awesome foes, to care about other people, and to give their best efforts in all situations. If you haven't watched a Power Ranger show or movie with your kids or grandkids, check one out--you might be surprised!!

Hi,

 I really like the power rangers and all the shows I just wish that they would have all the power rangers shows on dvd not just bites like they do with each new season.

From mighty morphin to now power rangers mystic force I do hope they will do them soon I still will watch the shows and record them too.

  candy
